Trigger.name: Staffcast
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "you" or matches[2] == "You" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) points? .+ at (.+) and \w+ screams in pain as \w+ skin begins to freeze and crack\.$
^(\w+) points? .+ at (.+), and a stream of bile-like acid streams out, covering \w+
^(You) point .+ at (.+), and cause a bolt of lightning to cascade out and roar screaming into \w+\.$
^As (\w+) points? .+ at (.+), a scintilla of bright, burning light shoots out, striking \w+ with focused elemental power\.$
^(\w+) points .+ at (.+), and a bolt of lightning cascades out and roars, screaming, into \w+ body\.$
